dcterms:creator: Justin Salamon
Christopher Jacoby
Juan Pablo Bello
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 8732 labeled sound excerpts (less than 4s) of urban sounds from 10 classes: air conditioner, car horn, children playing, dog bark, drilling, engine idling, gun shot, jackhammer, siren, and street music.
dcterms:title: UrbanSound 8K
